mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAYMENT ( LOCAL_ID, MEMBER_ID, PRICE, TOTAL_CNT, ORDER_CNT, REST_CNT, EXHIBITION_TITLE, EXHIBITION_IMAGE, RESERV_DATE ) VALUES ( #{localId}, #{memberId}, #{price}, #{totalCnt}, #{orderCnt}, #{totalCnt} - #{orderCnt}, #{exhibitionTitle}, #{exhibitionImage}, #{reservDate} );
mapper.select: SELECT TOTAL_CNT FROM PAYMENT WHERE LOCAL_ID = #{localId} LIMIT 1
SELECT (MAX(TOTAL_CNT)- SUM(ORDER_CNT)) AS REST_CNT FROM PAYMENT WHERE LOCAL_ID = #{localId} GROUP BY LOCAL_ID
SELECT * FROM PAYMENT WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY CREATE_DT DESC
SELECT * FROM PAYMENT WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} LIMIT 1
